name: Universal Ball
description: Embark on a thrilling journey as a curious ball in a vast universe. Fueled by your boundless curiosity, set out to explore uncharted territories and discover new planets. But beware, the journey ahead is not without danger. Use your wits and cunning to navigate obstacles and uncover the secrets of the cosmos. With every planet you discover, your knowledge and understanding of the universe grows. Can you satisfy your thirst for knowledge and unravel the mysteries of the universe? Play now and find out!
